Header: Aussie High Commissioner Meets Jaffna Commander
Content: High Commissioner of Australia in Sri Lanka HE David Holly during a visit to the North paid a courtesy call on Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, Commander Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J) on Wednesday (17). His delegation included Ms Danielle Cashen Second Secretary, Development Cooperation and Ms Jehannara Mohideen, Research and Information Officer. During the meet, Major General Wanigasooriya presented a comprehensive briefing to them on the current role and tasks of the Security Forces in Jaffna and ongoing projects related to promotion of reconciliation and ethnic harmony with special focus on civil-military cooperation in progress.
